LanguageData.AteMeat_Abhorrent.stages.ate_meat.label: ate meat
LanguageData.AteMeat_Abhorrent.stages.ate_meat.descri: I had to eat meat. It was an abhorrent violation of everything I believe.
LanguageData.AteMeat_Disapproved.stages.ate_meat.desc: I had to eat meat. It's not something I approve of.
LanguageData.AteMeat_Horrible.stages.ate_meat.label: ate meat
LanguageData.AteMeat_Horrible.stages.ate_meat.descrip: I had to eat meat. It was a horrible violation of my beliefs.
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Abhorrent.stages.ate_vegetari: I ate a meal without any meat. It was an abhorrent violation of the proper carnivore diet. Some eggs, milk, or processed food without vegetables would have also been okay.
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Disapproved.stages.ate_vegeta: I ate a meal without any meat. It was an unacceptable deviation from the proper carnivore diet. Some eggs, milk, or processed food without vegetables or would have also been okay.
LanguageData.AteNonMeat_Horrible.stages.ate_vegetaria: I ate a meal without any meat. It was an horrible violation of the proper carnivore diet. Some eggs, milk, or processed food without vegetables would have also been okay.
